message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $13,500. I believe it will be very valuable for you, even more so than my initial asking price.
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $13,500 is more than I'm willing to spend. I'm interested in the product, but I can only go up to $8,500.  Let me know if you're open to that.
Bob, thanks for the offer. I understand your position, but $8,500 is quite below its value.  How about we meet in the middle at $11,000?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $11,000 is still a bit out of my range.  I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product.  Let's see if we can reach a deal at this price.
